about_the_game:
You wake up from a nightmare. You can't count how many times you've had a nightmare this month. But this time, after waking up, you find some strange phenomena in your house. You want to go out to see, but the door is locked...

In this game, you play as an ordinary man living in an apartment and trying his best to escape this nightmare. The main focus of the game is puzzle exploration, followed by some parkour and platforming, all of which will be experienced in a terrifying atmosphere.

In the demo version, you will experience the first two levels of the game, which will be the beginning of a nightmare.

Key features

  • You'll experience this amazing and exciting adventure from a first-person perspective.

  • The controls are simple and consist of only interacting, walking, running, and jumping. Because these actions are enough to help you escape from the nightmare.

  • You will encounter a variety of puzzles, including normal puzzles, puzzles with monster chases, mazes, platform jumping, etc.

  • In the game, many incredible things will happen, infinite staircases, strange rooms, weird roads, as bizarre as a dream.

About the author

I often dream, some are beautiful dreams, some are nightmares, some are predictive dreams, some are inexplicable dreams, some are dreams within dreams, and some are sexy dreams. But among all the dreams, the ones that I remember most are nightmares. I often think of these nightmares and try to figure out their causes, but what fascinates me most is the real sense of terror when I have nightmares. So I made this game to record or reproduce that feeling. I hope everyone can experience it too.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains horror, suicide and other scenes

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
